text: Table 9 Cardiac risk stratification for non-cardiac surgical procedures [110]. Risk of procedure Examples High (> 5%) Aortic and major vascular surgery, peripheral vascular surgery Intermediate Intraperitoneal and intrathoracic (1-5%) surgery, carotid endarterectomy, head and neck surgery, orthopaedic surgery, prostate surgery Low (< 1%) Endoscopic procedures, superficial procedures, cataract surgery, breast surgery, ambulatory surgery ‘Cardiacrisk’ denotes combined incidence of cardiac death and nonfatal myocardial infarction.
